info.title: Rockbox API v1
info.summary: Retrieve metadata from Rockbox Library, control playback.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return. Default: 20. Minimum: 1. Maximum: 50.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first item to return. Default: 0 (the first item). Use with limit to get the next set of items.
